title: The Forest v0.06 (Public Alpha)(2014)(2-click run)
description:
No need for serials and cracks to get the full version, (already done it for you).
No unnecessary registry changes. 
No boring installation of tool-bars in your browser or other unwanted things.
You can even run this torrent from an USB-Stick.
Easy Uninstall with the Windows control panel.
Choose where you want to put the files on your PC. 
These are a few things that makes a 'Easy Run' version a better version.

If everybody seeds, you will get higher downloading speeds.

DESCRIPTION:
In The Forest, the player must survive on an island on which their character's plane has crashed by creating shelter, weapons, and other survival tools.
During the game the developers want players to question whether the island's cannibalistic tribe is the enemy of the player or vice versa;
for example, while fighting the player, the cannibals may try to protect one another from injury.
Though there are no set missions there will be an optional conclusion to the game.
The player will be largely safe during the day, allowing him to construct shelter and collect supplies, as the island's inhabitants are nocturnal.

Changes to the game version 0.06:
* A.I. - Added a new tribe - Mutant cannibals. Will have their dead comrades. 
* A.I. - Different tribes will interact with each other: hunting, killing, and even eating each other. 
* Improved shade! 
* 2 new systems of caves near the lake geese. 
* Fixed a bug on the torch lighting failure. 
* Added realistic caustic water. 
* Totems are now working correctly. 
* Fixed a problem with stuck mutants at the falls. 
* Cave mutants and animals will not get stuck on the trap loop. 
* Improved design trap loop. 
* All traps can be recharged. 
* The player can disable traps pushing a trigger. 
* Added 5 new plants. 
* Fixed bug with limited lower FPS due to grass. 
* NVIDIA graphics cards will use the discrete GPU chipsets Optimus. 
* Pressing "space" you can skip training. 
* Fixed a bug stuck arrows into the air. 
* Fixed bug small guy rocks above the ground. 
* Any movement will cause the player to get up if he sits on the bench. 
* Improved model of the bench. 
* New things: washed bags and floating containers. 
* New thing: orange tent. 
* New sound effects of the crash. 
* Fixed bug overlay killed rabbits and calendula in your inventory. 
* Improve the quality and look of the interior of the aircraft. 
* Added icon to retract circuit construction. 
* Fixed a bug where the icon to add resources remained even after the disappearance of the circuit construction. 
* You can break down the walls built with an ax to get logs. 
* Added music when the player wakes up on the plane. 
* Improved view of the landscape, the error accumulation of water in the rain. Added a new texture acute stone - is under water. 
* Improved parameters of the reservoir. 
* Crafting: Fixed an issue where you could remove the feathers before crafted arrows. Fixed a bug where you could not be crafted item because the order of the selected items. Adding the wrong thing at the craft craft to stop until this thing will not be removed. 
* Fixed bug with repeated drug disappearance craft. 
* Fixed graphical errors in the cave. 
* Improved coverage of the cave! 
* Increased speed of rabbits. 
* The brightness button "click to place" in the book of survival. 
* You can save the game in a tent without falling asleep. 
* Fixed bug with disappearing coins craft. 
* Fixed bug with incorrect calculation of survival days. 
* Fixed bug crickets singing in the afternoon. 
* Fixed bug with disappearing sounds of caves in the transition to other compounds cave. 
* More combat vibrations and fine-tune the weapon. 
* Optimized performance and memory usage.		

Installation instructions:
1. Execute the .exe file.
2. Follow the instructions.
3. Enjoy the program.
